product_name: Topeak DeFender M1 Front Fender- 27.5 and 29er
long_description: Supplying front wheel coverage for your mountain bike, the Topeak DeFender M1 Front Fender mounts to your fork's steerer tube and fits both 27.5 in. and 29er wheels. Rigid frame is co-molded to a flexible material for durability, and highly polished underside of the fender helps prevent dirt buildup in muddy conditions. Fender will disengage from fork if a large obstruction enters the wheel. Quick-release attachment fits 19.6 - 26mm and 27.7- 35mm steerer tubes. Compatible with all standard front forks including reverse arch designs.
short_description: Supplying front wheel coverage for your mountain bike, the Topeak DeFender M1 Front Fender mounts to your fork's steerer tube and fits both 27.5 in. and 29er wheels.
